name: Crazy Belts
description: Do you know what happens after check-in? Do you think our luggage is safe in the conveyor belts of the airport? Now you can discover the truth! Crazy Belts is a casual puzzle game that tells the amazing story of our bags, and why they end up in distant countries when we leave them in the belts...
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10 Процессор: 1.0 Ghz Оперативная память: 1024 MB ОЗУ Видеокарта: Open GL compatible graphics card DirectX: Версии 9.0 Место на диске: 160 MB
recommended_requirements: Рекомендованные: ОС: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10 Процессор: 2.0 Ghz Оперативная память: 1024 MB ОЗУ Видеокарта: Open GL compatible graphics card DirectX: Версии 11 Место на диске: 220 MB
